languages.text: {n}Спустя минуту друкари резко выпрямляется и замирает, явно переваривая собственное раздражение. В следующее мгновение Маражай поводит головой, словно оглядывая пропасть под своими ногами.{/n} "Подойди ко мне, {name}. Взгляни на этот вид".

{n}After a minute, Marazhai bolts upright and freezes, clearly wrestling with his own irritation. A moment later, he cranes his neck to look down into the abyss beneath his feet.{/n} "Come here, {name}. Take a look at this view."
languages.original_text: {n}Спустя минуту друкари резко выпрямляется и замирает, явно переваривая собственное раздражение. В следующее мгновение Маражай поводит головой, словно оглядывая пропасть под своими ногами.{/n} "Подойди ко мне, {name}. Взгляни на этот вид".

traits.locale_text: {n}After a minute, Marazhai bolts upright and freezes, clearly wrestling with his own irritation. A moment later, he cranes his neck to look down into the abyss beneath his feet.{/n} "Come here, {name}. Take a look at this view."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}After a minute, Marazhai bolts upright and freezes, clearly wrestling with his own irritation. A moment later, he cranes his neck to look down into the abyss beneath his feet.{/n} "Come here, {name}. Take a look at this view."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}After a minute, Marazhai bolts upright and freezes, clearly wrestling with his own irritation. A moment later, he cranes his neck to look down into the abyss beneath his feet.{/n} "Come here, {name}. Take a look at this view."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}After a minute, Marazhai bolts upright and freezes, clearly wrestling with his own irritation. A moment later, he cranes his neck to look down into the abyss beneath his feet.{/n} "Come here, {name}. Take a look at this view."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}过了一分钟，玛拉斋猛地挺直了身子，僵在原地。很显然，他在努力抑制着心中的怒火。又过了一会儿，他扬起头，看着脚下的深渊。{/n}“快过来，{name}，看看这里的景色。”
languages.original_text: {n}After a minute, Marazhai bolts upright and freezes, clearly wrestling with his own irritation. A moment later, he cranes his neck to look down into the abyss beneath his feet.{/n} "Come here, {name}. Take a look at this view."

traits.locale_text: {n}过了一分钟，玛拉斋猛地挺直了身子，僵在原地。很显然，他在努力抑制着心中的怒火。又过了一会儿，他扬起头，看着脚下的深渊。{/n}“快过来，{name}，看看这里的景色。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}1分後、マラズハイは突然直立不動になり、ピタリと止まった。どう見ても己の苛立ちと戦っている。しばらくして、マラズハイは首を伸ばして足元の深い穴を見下ろした。{/n}「こっちへ来い、{name}。これを見るんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}After a minute, Marazhai bolts upright and freezes, clearly wrestling with his own irritation. A moment later, he cranes his neck to look down into the abyss beneath his feet.{/n} "Come here, {name}. Take a look at this view."

traits.locale_text: {n}1分後、マラズハイは突然直立不動になり、ピタリと止まった。どう見ても己の苛立ちと戦っている。しばらくして、マラズハイは首を伸ばして足元の深い穴を見下ろした。{/n}「こっちへ来い、{name}。これを見るんだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Al cabo de un rato, Marazhai se pone en pie de un brinco y se queda muy quieto, debatiéndose visiblemente contra su propia frustración. Luego estira el cuello para mirar al fondo del abismo que se abre a sus pies.{/n} «Ven, {name}. Mira qué vista».
languages.original_text: {n}After a minute, Marazhai bolts upright and freezes, clearly wrestling with his own irritation. A moment later, he cranes his neck to look down into the abyss beneath his feet.{/n} "Come here, {name}. Take a look at this view."

traits.locale_text: {n}Al cabo de un rato, Marazhai se pone en pie de un brinco y se queda muy quieto, debatiéndose visiblemente contra su propia frustración. Luego estira el cuello para mirar al fondo del abismo que se abre a sus pies.{/n} «Ven, {name}. Mira qué vista».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Au bout d'une minute, Marazhai se redresse subitement et s'immobilise, visiblement aux prises avec son propre agacement. Un instant plus tard, il tend le cou pour observer l'abîme en contrebas.{/n} « Approchez, {name}. Venez voir ça. »
languages.original_text: {n}After a minute, Marazhai bolts upright and freezes, clearly wrestling with his own irritation. A moment later, he cranes his neck to look down into the abyss beneath his feet.{/n} "Come here, {name}. Take a look at this view."

traits.locale_text: {n}Au bout d'une minute, Marazhai se redresse subitement et s'immobilise, visiblement aux prises avec son propre agacement. Un instant plus tard, il tend le cou pour observer l'abîme en contrebas.{/n} « Approchez, {name}. Venez voir ça. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Nach einer Minute schnellt Marazhai hoch und erstarrt. Offensichtlich hadert er mit seiner eigenen Verärgerung. Einen Moment später streckt er den Hals aus und blickt herab in den Abgrund unter seinen Füßen.{/n} "Kommt her, {name}. Schaut Euch diese Aussicht an."
languages.original_text: {n}After a minute, Marazhai bolts upright and freezes, clearly wrestling with his own irritation. A moment later, he cranes his neck to look down into the abyss beneath his feet.{/n} "Come here, {name}. Take a look at this view."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einer Minute schnellt Marazhai hoch und erstarrt. Offensichtlich hadert er mit seiner eigenen Verärgerung. Einen Moment später streckt er den Hals aus und blickt herab in den Abgrund unter seinen Füßen.{/n} "Kommt her, {name}. Schaut Euch diese Aussicht an."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, bir süre sonra sinirle yerinden fırlayarak donakalıyor. Rahatsızlığına karşı mücadele verdiği çok açık. Ardından ayaklarının altında uzanan uçuruma bakmak için boynunu uzatıyor.{/n} "{name}, gel buraya. Şu manzaraya bir bak."
languages.original_text: {n}After a minute, Marazhai bolts upright and freezes, clearly wrestling with his own irritation. A moment later, he cranes his neck to look down into the abyss beneath his feet.{/n} "Come here, {name}. Take a look at this view."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, bir süre sonra sinirle yerinden fırlayarak donakalıyor. Rahatsızlığına karşı mücadele verdiği çok açık. Ardından ayaklarının altında uzanan uçuruma bakmak için boynunu uzatıyor.{/n} "{name}, gel buraya. Şu manzaraya bir bak."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
